analysis.description:
Broker._withdraw (/unique_chucks/18/0xe777047ee330200775d7fb7e0051432f68c36821.sol#1118-1140) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _withdrawer.transfer(_amount) (/unique_chucks/18/0xe777047ee330200775d7fb7e0051432f68c36821.sol#1137)

Broker.slowWithdraw (/unique_chucks/18/0xe777047ee330200775d7fb7e0051432f68c36821.sol#617-634) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool,string)(announcement.amount == _amount,Invalid amount)
Broker.renounceOwnership (/unique_chucks/18/0xe777047ee330200775d7fb7e0051432f68c36821.sol#1109-1112) should be declared external
Ownable.renounceOwnership (/unique_chucks/18/0xe777047ee330200775d7fb7e0051432f68c36821.sol#42-48) should be declared external
